website_summaries.verdict: Tames frizz while imparting shine. Makes your mane manageable and luxurious, whether you have straight or curly hair.
pros: Easily apply after showering and before styling
cons: Contains silicone derivatives, which some consumers prefer to avoid

customer_reviews.title: The Best Keratase Oil for Me
customer_reviews.text: Very good, my favourite Keratase Oil, I've tried 4 different kinds from Keratase. I have very dry, thin, over- permed hair. It helped my hair. Will order another soon.
customer_reviews.author: tl

customer_reviews.title: Liquid Gold
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like liquid gold! Works wonders in the humidity on my curly hair and when it’s flat ironed.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good after a shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Keristase oleo relax smells heavenly and helps with curly hair after a shampoo. I have bought for years from hair salon. They no longer carry it. Not sure why. It is a wonderful product, even though pricey
customer_reviews.author: pstuhr340

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like
customer_reviews.text: It is good but doesn’t give enough shine or soft touch. It is not amazing product. And doesn’t control frizz
customer_reviews.author: DULCE BENAVIDES

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the former product
customer_reviews.text: This version is recommended on their website to replace a better, no longer made version. I will probably keep using it rather than hunt for another option, but disappointed in this updated product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil. Makes the hair so shiny and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stowers

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. But it is super expensive for the amount of product.
customer_reviews.author: Meira

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This product was horrible. The box came all beat up and opened. So I returned. Do not buy from this seller
customer_reviews.author: Sara B

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed.
customer_reviews.text: Will return. There was no seal. It’s already open. Reluctant to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bring the original oleo relax serum back!!!
customer_reviews.text: The old oleo relax was SO much better at reducing frizz. Product vs product, this one is far inferior. Also can’t get the old one anymore they’ve jacked the price up to $80 on amazon :(
customer_reviews.author: Ancelan mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love Kerastase products and this is no exception! The smell is my favorite thing! Well that and it smooths my otherwise coarse, frizzy hair! I also love that the packaging is mostly glass not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wescott

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful smooth hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products I have ever used on my hair! It smells amazing, great for detangling and smooths out the frizzies. It’s more on the pricy side, but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Shara Hammond

customer_reviews.title: It makes my hair shiny and less kinky.
customer_reviews.text: My hair has been dry and this product has helped
customer_reviews.author: Leah

product_meta.title: Kerastase Discipline Oleo-Relax Advanced Hair Oil 3.4 oz
product_meta.description: Kerastase Discipline Oleo-Relax Advanced Hair Oil 3.4 oz
feature_bullets: Control-in-motion hair oil for voluminous & unruly hair.
